channel.title: [508] Help At Login

item.title: [508] Help At Login
item.dc:creator: @shayd3e shayd3e
item.description:
@shayd3e wrote:

Sorry about the topic title
What i need help with is when i login to the server as admin
i want it to say
adminstrator shayde has logged in
this is what i have done

if (p.Rights == 2) p.frames.sendMessage(pz, "<col=0000FF>"+Misc.optimizeTextAdminstrator (p.username) + " has logged in. There are now "+ Engine.getPlayerCount()+" players online." ); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to shayde-Scape."); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Type ::help if you are new!."); else if (p.Rights == 0) p.frames.sendMessage(pz, "<col=0000FF>"+Misc.optimizeText(p.username) + " has logged in. There are now "+ Engine.getPlayerCount()+" players online." ); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to shayde-Scape."); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Type ::help if you are new!."); }

But when i compile i get an error
can someone help me with this

Read full topic
